subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Giants are one of the hottest teams in the N.F.L., having won six consecutive games. They are also one of the most rested, having not played since defeating Miami eight days ago.
snippet: The Giants are one of the hottest teams in the N.F.L., having won six consecutive games. They are also one of the most rested, having not played since defeating Miami eight days ago.
